steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f405r","text":"Inject mouse intraperitoneally with   of Ultra-LEAF Purified anti-mouse CD4 or Rat IgG2b isotype control antibodies (Biolegend, Cat #100457 and Cat #400644; San Diego, CA) 3 and 1 days prior to immunization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"79DA6840212411EEA2F72F085FD67B55","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4om2o","text":"After immunization, inject mice with   of antibody weekly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"82B281A0212411EEA2F72F085FD67B55","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92aib","text":"Assess cell depletion by flow cytometric analysis of mouse blood serum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3gm9","text":"For depletion of CD8+ T cells, inject the mouse intraperitoneally with   of Ultra-LEAF Purified CD8+ or Rat IgG2b isotype control antibodies (Biolegend Cat # 100746 and Cat #400644; San Diego, CA) 2 days prior to immunization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"978D6770212411EEA2F72F085FD67B55","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85rfu","text":"After immunization, inject mice with   of each antibody 9- and 19-days post immunization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"25pl0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"9E5B0AD0212411EEA2F72F085FD67B55","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}
